product_name: Wigwam Signature Pro Low Cut Socks
long_description: With a streamlined fit and moisture-wicking fabric, the Wigwam Signature Pro Low Cut Socks keep your feet cool, dry and blister-free so you can forget about your feet and focus on hitting your pace. Odor-resistant Ultimax(R) Pro fabric blend combines nylon with Dri-release(R) Tencel (88% polyester/12% lyocell) for smooth, moisture-wicking comfort. Added spandex ensures a snug, no-slip fit. Strategically placed mesh panels promote ventilation; seamless toes reduce chafing and irritation. The Wigwam Signature Pro Low Cut socks feature heel tabs to help prevent socks from slipping down. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: With a streamlined fit and moisture-wicking fabric, the Wigwam Signature Pro Low Cut Socks keep your feet cool, dry and blister-free so you can forget about your feet and focus on hitting your pace.
